sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Intel ( INTC ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 2.2%.
Year to date, Intel registers a 2.2% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Chevron ( CVX ), trading down 0.3%.
Chevron is lower by about 0.3% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Procter & Gamble ( PG ), trading down 0.3%, and Microsoft ( MSFT ), trading up 2.0% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
